languages.text: "В подобных местах мне хочется думать о снеге — чистом, не испорченном человеческой грязью. Под морозным светом звезды, что освещает все — до самых глубин души".

traits.locale_text: "В подобных местах мне хочется думать о снеге — чистом, не испорченном человеческой грязью. Под морозным светом звезды, что освещает все — до самых глубин души".

languages.text: "Places such as this make me think of snow — pure and untainted by human squalor. Under the frozen light of a star that illuminates everything — to the very depths of one's soul."
languages.original_text: "В подобных местах мне хочется думать о снеге — чистом, не испорченном человеческой грязью. Под морозным светом звезды, что освещает все — до самых глубин души".

traits.locale_text: "Places such as this make me think of snow — pure and untainted by human squalor. Under the frozen light of a star that illuminates everything — to the very depths of one's soul."
"Places such as this make me think of snow — pure and untainted by human squalor. Under the frozen light of a star that illuminates everything — to the very depths of one's soul."
"Places such as this make me think of snow — pure and untainted by human squalor. Under the frozen light of a star that illuminates everything — to the very depths of one's soul."
"Places such as this make me think of snow — pure and untainted by human squalor. Under the frozen light of a star that illuminates everything — to the very depths of one's soul."
"Places such as this make me think of snow — pure and untainted by human squalor. Under the frozen light of a star that illuminates everything — to the very depths of one's soul."
"Places such as this make me think of snow — pure and untainted by human squalor. Under the frozen light of a star that illuminates everything — to the very depths of one's soul."

languages.text: «Los lugares como este me recuerdan a la nieve: puros, ajenos a la miseria y la suciedad humana. Bajo la luz gélida de una estrella que lo ilumina todo, hasta las profundidades del alma».
languages.original_text: "Places such as this make me think of snow — pure and untainted by human squalor. Under the frozen light of a star that illuminates everything — to the very depths of one's soul."

languages.text: 「このような場所は、雪を思い起こさせる。人間の穢れに汚されていない、純粋な雪を。あまねく照らす星の、魂の奥底までも凍てつかせる光の下の雪を」
languages.original_text: "Places such as this make me think of snow — pure and untainted by human squalor. Under the frozen light of a star that illuminates everything — to the very depths of one's soul."

languages.text: “这样的地方不禁让我想起了雪原，洁白纯净的雪花，没被人类的污秽所玷污。那颗恒星散发着冰冷的光芒，照亮了万物，一直照到灵魂深处。”
languages.original_text: "Places such as this make me think of snow — pure and untainted by human squalor. Under the frozen light of a star that illuminates everything — to the very depths of one's soul."

languages.text: "An Orten wie diesem muss ich immer an Schnee denken ... rein und unbefleckt vom Elend der Menschen. Unter dem eisigen Licht eines Sterns, der alles erhellt ... bis in die Tiefen der eigenen Seele."
languages.original_text: "Places such as this make me think of snow — pure and untainted by human squalor. Under the frozen light of a star that illuminates everything — to the very depths of one's soul."

languages.text: « De tels lieux me font penser à la neige : purs, épargnés par la misère humaine… Sous la froide lumière d'une étoile resplendissante qui illumine jusqu'au plus profond de l'âme. »
languages.original_text: "Places such as this make me think of snow — pure and untainted by human squalor. Under the frozen light of a star that illuminates everything — to the very depths of one's soul."
"Places such as this make me think of snow — pure and untainted by human squalor. Under the frozen light of a star that illuminates everything — to the very depths of one's soul."

languages.text: "Bunun gibi yerler, aklıma karlı günleri getiriyor. Saf ve insanların sefilliğinden nasibini almamış... Göz alabildiğine her şeyi aydınlatan bir yıldızın donuk ışığı altında, insanın ruhunun en derinliklerine işleyen o günler..."
languages.original_text: "Places such as this make me think of snow — pure and untainted by human squalor. Under the frozen light of a star that illuminates everything — to the very depths of one's soul."
